msg: BOOKKEEPER-457: Create a format command for Hedwig to cleanup its metadata. (sijie via ivank)

author: jbonofre
msg: [KARAF-2041] Refactore the Cellar LocalBundleListener to use a SynchronousBundleListener and unregister itself when receiving STOPPED or STOPPING event from the framework (bundle ID 0).
